attributes.action: FIFA to take the 2022 World Cup away from Qatar.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government to lead an international campaign demanding that FIFA re-run the manifestly corrupt process which awarded the 2022 FIFA World Cup to Qatar.

Those countries who bid the first time around should be allowed to re-bid. Any shortfall in nations bidding can be compensated for by allowing other countries that did not bid the first time around to bid in the re-run process.

Qatar should be excluded from the re-run process.
